title: Marcus Sheridan: "I'm Not a Genius..."
itunes:author: John Bonini
itunes:summary: Legendary marketing speaker Marcus Sheridan take us inside those dark days in 2008 while he was struggling to turn around his business, and how along the way, he learned lessons that he now shares with the world.
